W removeComments

Initial value:

 function(s) {
  var lines, i, t;
  
  lines = s.split("\n");
  t = "";
  for (i = 0; i < lines.length; i++)
    t += lines[i].replace(/([^\x2f]*)\x2f\x2f.*$/, "$1");
  
  t = t.replace(/(.*)\n(.*)/g, "$1 $2");
  
  lines = t.split("*/");
  t = "";
  for (i = 0; i < lines.length; i++)
    t += lines[i].replace(/(.*)\x2f\x2a(.*)$/g, "$1 ");
  return t;
}
